title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 2. Paragraph (7A) of Regulation 22 of the European Union (Alternative
text_raw:
2. Paragraph (7A) of Regulation 22 of the European Union (Alternative 
Investment Fund Managers) Regulations 2013 (S.I. No. 257 of 2013) is 
revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

12 December, 2023. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 
Minister for Finance. 

1 OJ No. L 174, 01.07.2011, p. 1 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 15th December, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [630] 3

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of these Regulations is to revoke paragraph (7A) of Regulation 22 
of the European Union (Alternative Investment Fund Managers) Regulations 
2013 (S.I. No. 257 of 2013) to ensure the AIFM Regulations are in alignment 
with EU requirements. 

These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Alternative 
Investment Fund Managers) (Amendment) Regulations 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [630]
